subSections.text:
{{zh-hanzi}}

# [[monkey]]; [[ape]]
# [[naughty]] [[child]]
# {{lb|zh|Min Nan}} [[male]] [[paramour]]

# {{lb|zh|dialectal}} to [[squat]] like a [[monkey]]
# {{lb|zh|dialectal}} [[naughty]]; [[clever]]
# {{lb|zh|Min Nan}} [[skinny]] and [[dark-skinned]]; [[ugly]] as a monkey
# {{surname|lang=zh}}
